thread.title: Eloquent Light Photography Workshops 30th Anniversary Celebration
thread.title_full: Eloquent Light Photography Workshops 30th Anniversary Celebration

author: Cindy Lane
title: Eloquent Light Photography Workshops 30th Anniversary Celebration
text:
To commemorate Eloquent Light Photography Workshop's 30th year of offering exceptional photography workshops, you are invited to enter a random drawing for a chance to win one of over 30 prizes! 30th Anniversary Celebration with Random Prize Drawing - 30 for 30!
Thirty years ago Eloquent Light Photography Workshops began as a dream in the red hills of Ghost Ranch, a landscape made famous by the painter Georgia O'Keeffe. There in the brilliant light and awesome color of that incredible landscape a new photography workshop program was born, inspired by the great photography workshops of the past offered by Ansel Adams, Edward Weston and others.
To commemorate the celebration of Eloquent Light Photography Workshop's 30th year of offering exceptional photography workshops, you are invited to enter a random drawing this October for a chance to win one of over 30 great prizes! All through the month of October they will celebrate the anniversary of their founding.
First with announcing their exciting schedule of workshops for 2016 - not only in our beloved New Mexico, but also along the magical coast of California. Eloquent Light Photography Workshops offers hands-on photography workshops at some of the most inspiring locations in the American
West. Award-winning fine-art photographer Craig Varjabedian founded Eloquent Light in 1986, which is based in Santa Fe, New Mexico. They have conducted workshops in the most inspiring locations of this magnificent region, from the Rocky Mountains to the Pacific coast. Workshop participants spend every day outside learning to capture the light, color, beauty, and character of
their surroundings. Eloquent Light conducts its workshops in small groups or privately, to ensure maximum benefits to its participants. And a special "invitational" workshop will be announced soon.
And second, finally no celebration party would be complete without party favors. With this in mind they announce an exciting opportunity to win some really great prizes through the month of October. Prizes include an Eloquent Light Photography Workshop gift certificate, a fine art photograph by Craig Varjabedian, gorgeous art books, photography equipment and software, and
other great prizes valued at over $10,000. from their workshop sponsors: NEC Displays, Think Tank Photo, Sirui, DxO Labs, Alien Skin Software, Topaz Labs, Photoshelter, Gura Gear, Macphun Software, Moab Paper, Bay Photo Lab and the University of New Mexico Press.
Enter the Celebration Prize Drawing at: (www.surveymonkey.com/r/eloquentlightdrawing) and see all of the great prizes. Enter for a chance to win by October 30, 2015.
